title: 'GM Street' — McAdoo's and McAdon'ts (Ep. 184)
description:
The Ringer's Michael Lombardi sits down with Tate Frazier to discuss Ben McAdoo's future with the Giants (02:30), the Chargers' innovative ways of losing (06:30), the lack of detail in Oakland (11:00), what's wrong in Denver (16:00), big coaching positions opening up in the NCAA (24:30), and Roger Goodell's contract negotiations (32:45).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
